description: Upward Mobility's Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA) Flashcards present 247 essential terms and concepts for the aspiring security admin.  ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  Topics include those present in the CCSA course and exam (Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA) R70/R71 Certification), but are also suitable for those learning the system.  Topics include:  Check Point technology, deployment platforms, security policies, traffic & connections, user management, Encryption, IPS Event Analysis, and fire control.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
